effects: Physical damage (2.5x, ATK) to one enemy
Reduce DEF and SPR by 45% for 3 turns to one enemy

Gain access to following skills for one turn:
	Fatal Barrage (505790)
	Last Shot (505780)

desc_short: Damage and reduce DEF and SPR for one enemy, and enable last shot and fatal barrage for one turn
攻擊1名敵人+降低防禦精神的數值+1回合內可以使用「最後一射」「致命火力」
적 1명에게 피해+방어력과 정신력 감소+1턴 동안 '라스트 샷', '꽃잎 세례' 사용 가능
Dégâts et réduit la DEF et la PSY d'un ennemi, et active Dernier tir et Barrage fatal pendant un tour
Fügt einem Gegner Schaden zu und verringert seine ABW und PSY + ermöglicht eine Runde lang Letzter Schuss sowie Tödliches Sperrfeuer.
Daña y reduce la DEF y el ESP de un enemigo, aprende Disparo final y Ráfaga mortal durante un turno
